get.description: List all deployments for a service/domain/env
List deployment details with an deployment id

delete.description: Delete deployment details with an deployment id

domain.description: Name of the domain the service belongs to

environment.description: Environment logical id for the deployment

scm_url.description: SCM tool url where the source code is pulled from

scm_branch.description: Name of the branch being deployed
